app.ai package

Submodules

app.ai.ai module

app.ai.ai.summarize_transcript(record_dir: str, lang: str)[source]

Summarizes the transcript of an audio recording using OpenAI’s ChatGPT model.

Parameters:

  • record_dir (str) – Path to the directory containing the transcript file.

  • lang (str) – Language used in recorded meetings.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the transcript file does not exist.

app.ai.ai.transcribe_audio(record_dir: str, lang: str)[source]

Transcribes the combined audio file from a recording directory using OpenAI’s Whisper API.

Parameters:

  • record_dir (str) – Path to the directory containing the audio file.

  • lang (str) – Language used in recorded meeting.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the combined audio file does not exist.

app.ai.convert_to_pdf module

class app.ai.convert_to_pdf.PDFGenerator(summary_path, transcription_path, output_pdf_path)[source]

Bases: object

A class to generate a PDF document by combining summary and transcription files.

summary_path

Path to the summary text file.

Type:

str

transcription_path

Path to the transcription text file.

Type:

str

output_pdf_path

Path where the generated PDF will be saved.

Type:

str

pdf

Instance of the FPDF class for generating PDFs.

Type:

FPDF

add_text_to_pdf(title, content)[source]

Adds a title and content to the PDF.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – The title to be added at the top of the page.

  • content (list) – Lines of text content to be added to the PDF.

generate_pdf()[source]

Generates a PDF combining the summary and transcription content.

The content from the summary and transcription files is read, added to the PDF, and the resulting PDF is saved to the specified output path.

Raises:

Exception – If any error occurs during the PDF generation process.

read_file(txt_file_path)[source]

Reads content from a text file.

Parameters:

txt_file_path (str) – Path to the text file.

Returns:

Lines of text from the file.

Return type:

list

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the specified file does not exist.
